entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 7:29 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:29 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
